language.description: card commands exchanger for PC/SC and serial readers
language.readersel: Enter reader number to use (write EXIT to exit)
language.cmdtosend: Enter command to send (write EXIT to exit)
language.wrongcmd: wrong command format (can use: 0x11 0x22 0x33... etc, or 11 22 33.. etc, or 112233)
language.infodesc:
Cross platform C# application to send/receive data with a standard PC/SC smartcard reader.
- Multilanguage (using xml language files in Language folder)
- Gui (using GTK# binding for GTK graphic libraries and Qyoto binding for QT graphic libraries)
- Console interface also supported
- Debug/Trace (can be sended to console and also to a log file to read after)

shortcut on command file area row:
   F5: copy command from row to command field
   F6: send immidiatelly command from selected row
   double click: same of F5
